main event: A report from Brewster, Ohio documents a sighting of a metallic, disk-like object hovering and moving erratically in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on a clear, sunny day,The object was about the size of a large automobile,The observer watched the object for 10 to 15 minutes,The object suddenly shot straight up and disappeared, The report mentions that the phenomena have deeper significance than initially supposed.
witness description: individuals interested in the UFO phenomenon
